title: Car Rental System
brief_description: A full-stack car rental platform that enables users to browse, book, and manage cars seamlessly. Built with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication (Firebase & JWT), real-time car availability, booking management, and advanced filtering.
main_features: 📄 Private routes for My Bookings and Car Details
🎨 Attractive UI with animation and modals

title: Roommate Finder System
brief_description: Roommate Finder is a web platform designed to help individuals find compatible roommates based on location, budget, lifestyle preferences, and interests. Users can create profiles, search for suitable roommates, and explore available listings easily.
main_features: 📱 Search roommates by location, budget, and lifestyle preferences
🎨 Responsive design for mobile and desktop

title: Job Listing & Finder Web Application
brief_description: A responsive job listing platform that allows users to explore job opportunities across various companies, view company and job details, and manage their profiles securely.
main_features: 👤 Private Routes for Company Details and Profile
🧾 Dynamic Company & Job Listing with JSON-based data
💼 Job Details Modal with full info and Apply button
🖼️ User Profile View and Update (Name, Photo URL)
🎨 Smooth UI/UX with Framer Motion Animations
❌ Custom 404 Page and one extra informative route
